subject: $89.95 Adobe Photoshop CS3 Extended
body:
Absence -- that common cure of love.
Adults are obsolete children.
Soft words win hard hearts.
Books are the bees which carry the quickening pollen from one to another mind.
Attachment is the great fabricator of illusions reality can be attained only by someone who is detached.
The Buddhas do but tell the way it is for you to swelter at the task.
You can do anything in this world if you are prepares to take the consequences.
The strongest poison ever known came from Caesar's laurel crown.
The rate of interest acts as a link between income-value and capital-value
A scholar who cherishes the love of comfort is not fit to be deemed a scholar.
Let no man under value the price of a virtuous woman's counsel.
A baby is God's opinion that life should go on.
Well begun is half done.
Once you say you're going to settle for second, that's what happens to you in life.
It is the perpetual dread of fear, the fear of fear, that shapes the face of a brave man.
Men who do things without being told draw the most wages.
None are so old as those who have outlived enthusiasm
It is useless to close the gates against ideas they overlap them.
My attitude toward men who mess around is simple: If you find 'em, kill 'em.
